com.sirqul.sdk.widget

Class SirqulViewWrapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sirqul.sdk.widget.SirqulViewWrapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type used for the content data for an instance of a SirqulArrayAdapter.

    public abstract class SirqulViewWrapper<T>
extends Object
    The Class SirqulViewWrapper.
    Author:
    John Schleppy

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void injectView(View view)
      Supplies you with the ArrayAdapter item view, so you can retrieve references to view and widgets from your layout supplied to your SirqulArrayAdapter.
      abstract void populateItem(Context context, int position, T object, Map<Integer,SirqulViewWrapperListener<T>> viewIdListeners, Bundle itemBundle)

    • Constructor Detail

      • SirqulViewWrapper

        public SirqulViewWrapper()

    • Method Detail

      • injectView

        public abstract void injectView(View view)
        Supplies you with the ArrayAdapter item view, so you can retrieve references to view and widgets from your layout supplied to your SirqulArrayAdapter. It's here you would do something like this:

         TextView myTextView = (TextView) row.findViewById(R.id.myTextView);
        Parameters:
        view - the ArrayAdapter item View.

      • populateItem

        public abstract void populateItem(Context context,
                int position,
                T object,
                Map<Integer,SirqulViewWrapperListener<T>> viewIdListeners,
                Bundle itemBundle)
        Populate a ArrayAdapter with content data, listeners, and any additional needed data.
        Parameters:
        context - the context from the SirqulArrayAdapter.
        position - the position of this item within the SirqulArrayAdapter.
        object - the content data object for this item within the SirqulArrayAdapter.
        viewIdListeners - the listeners that are mapped to specific view or widget id's within the view layout supplied to the SirqulArrayAdapter.
        itemBundle - the SirqulArrayAdapter item Bundle for supplying any additional data to this item row.
